plot: When two sisters fight over who's turn it is to do the laundry, bondage results. A burglar takes advantage of the ladies' preoccupation and forces Kristine to tie Whitney to a chair, then he binds Kristine in a tight hogtie
title: Sisfits
plot_es: When two sisters fight over who's turn it is to do the laundry, bondage results. A burglar takes advantage of the ladies' preoccupation and forces Kristine to tie Whitney to a chair, then he binds Kristine in a tight hogtie
plot_en: When two sisters fight over who's turn it is to do the laundry, bondage results. A burglar takes advantage of the ladies' preoccupation and forces Kristine to tie Whitney to a chair, then he binds Kristine in a tight hogtie
